name: Tails from the Woods (sohakes, Eduardo Pinheiro, gcebrian, fcostaian)
name_original: Tails from the Woods (sohakes, Eduardo Pinheiro, gcebrian, fcostaian)
description:
Protect yourself and your friends from forest predators.

In this tactics game, you play with a guinea pig, a rat and a rabbit, protecting themselves from a snake, alligator and a owl. The game has a fixed turn order, always changing between teams and with a turn consisting of a move and attack phase, both skippable.

The relevance to the theme is that the prey are together protecting themselves against predators.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8) (https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8/rate/1680783)

The rotate camera buttons are (maybe?) not working. Use A and D instead. Also there are some bugs with the in game replay button, refresh the browser instead. The attack and move stages are optional, press the "Don't move/attack" button in the bottom left corner if you want to skip the stage.

Credits: 

Programmer: Eduardo G. Pinheiro (epinheiro.itch.io)

Artist: Gabriel Cebrián (gcebrian.itch.io)

Programmer: Ian F. Costa (fcostaian.itch.io)

Programmer: Rafael M. Tomazela (sohakes.itch.io)
